Although in most cases the headings, given in the form prescribed, are
not applicable because of the new nature of this project, the following
comments may be helpful!
a. General method and/or experimental design*
1* Controls! Control groups will vary from location to location*
In most cases existing control groups, already established for
the other projects in progress, will be used. Since the
cooperation of the CBC Research Department and the supervision
of the NAEB Research Committee are committed, these will meet
statistically valid standards in each case.
2. Sampling plan and procedure! Not applicable,
